metadata.title: CVE-2023-2142 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In Nunjucks versions prior to version 3.2.4, it waspossible to bypass the restrictions which are provided by the autoescape functionality. If there are two user-controlled parameters on the sameline used in the views, it was possible to inject cross site scriptingpayloads using the backslash \ character.

criterions.comment: node-nunjucks package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
